channel.title: Inquisitor nerf
channel.description: Why can the inquisitor keep using his abilities after sorcerer is dead? I propose inquisitor to work like scorned, when he can no longer use his abilities after he wins, I mean if he manages to kill sorcerer he already helped BD, he can still help BD if he wants but he shouldn't be so powerful after sorcerer is gone, this is specially problematic in cult games.
